title: Jude Cole - A View From 3rd Street [1990][320 KBPS]

Cover Art






From Wikipedia:



Jude Anthony Cole (born 18 June 1960) is an American manager, record producer and singer/songwriter/guitarist.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Cole's first three solo records, Jude Cole (1987), A View from 3rd Street (1990) and Start the Car (1992) were released on Warner Bros./Reprise Records, and contained the singles "Baby, It's Tonight," "Time for Letting Go" and "Start the Car." His fourth album, I Don't Know Why I Act This Way, was released by Island Records in 1996, and his last album, Falling Home was self-published in 2000.

In 2005, Cole contributed segments to the entertainment television program Extra.

Cole wrote the musical score for three films with his record company partner, actor/director Kiefer Sutherland.

Cole is manager of the American rock band, Lifehouse, and has co-written songs with Jason Wade.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
